summary: Diff largely focuses on visual/UX polish (warm theme tokens in index.css, typography hierarchy, updated Tailwind fonts, and redesigned Header/Footer and several pages). However, there are signs of functionality/feature changes (Admin "Update Starters" + new mutation) and some pages still hardcode non-warm (blue/purple) status/notification colors, which undermines the cohesive warm culinary theme requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply a cohesive, modern “warm culinary” visual theme consistently across all pages.
missing_requirements.reason: Some pages still use explicit blue/purple/green status color classes that may conflict with a cohesive warm, food-inspired palette across the site.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin feature: new "Update Starters" button that calls backend addStarters method, plus a new useAddStarters mutation hook.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states this is a visual/UX polish pass only and lists adding new product features/admin tools as a non-goal; this introduces new admin functionality and backend interaction.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AdminPage includes new "Update Starters" button calling backend addStarters)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (useQueries.ts includes new useAddStarters mutation hook)
